Next Steps Tracking

Property

Description

Type

ID

Unique ID for the message

Auto number

nextStepUserID

ID from the nextStep user entity

Integer/ entity reference

created

created date/time

timestamp

changed

changed date/time

timestamp

step_sent

ID of the component sent

integer

reply_received

Reply received

string

next_step

ID of the next step to send

integer

next_step_due_date

date to send next step

timestamp

resent_count

integer

integer

This table is used to store a history of messages sent.
